ai-iti40:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti40:2.1_0: “Mendicants, ignorance precedes the attainment of unskillful qualities, with lack of conscience and prudence following along.
ai-iti40:2.2_0: Knowledge precedes the attainment of skillful qualities, with conscience and prudence following along.”
ai-iti40:2.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti40:3.2_0: in this world or the next.
ai-iti40:4.1_0: Since one of wicked desires is
ai-iti40:4.4_0: which sends them to a place of loss.
ai-iti40:5.3_0: of the outcome of greed, hate, and delusion,

ai-iti40:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
